articles.description: Reaction to Manchester United's 4-3 defeat at Bayern Munich and Arsenal's 4-0 win over PSV Eindhoven, plus build-up to Thursday's European matches.
articles.title: Champions League reaction - Man Utd lose at Bayern, Arsenal thrash PSV

articles.description: Somerset batter Tom Kohler-Cadmore replaces the rested Joe Root for the remaining two matches of the one-day international series against Ireland.
articles.title: Kohler-Cadmore replaces Root in England squad

articles.description: Saudi Arabia crown prince Mohammed bin Salman says he is focused on economic targets.
articles.title: 'I don't care about sportswashing'

articles.description: Manchester United goalkeeper Andre Onana says he has "let the team down" and that they failed to get a result at Bayern Munich "because of me".
articles.title: Man Utd lost to Bayern because of me - Onana

articles.description: Follow live text updates and BBC radio commentary from day three of round 15 of the 2023 County Championship.
articles.title: County Championship day three - radio & text

articles.description: Briton Conor Benn expects "more fighters will test positive for clomifene" as he makes his return to boxing this weekend.
articles.title: 'More fighters will test positive for clomifene'

articles.description: England captain Millie Bright says the Lionesses have "come to an agreement" with the Football Association following their dispute over play bonuses.
articles.title: Bright says Lionesses have reached agreement with FA

articles.description: Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag says goalkeeper Andre Onana will "bounce back" from his mistake against Bayern Munich.
articles.title: Onana will bounce back after mistake - Ten Hag

articles.description: Mercedes' Lewis Hamilton believes Red Bull will be back on top at this weekend's Japanese Grand Prix.
articles.title: Hamilton expects 'phenomenal' Red Bull to win in Japan

articles.description: With Aston Villa back in Europe and set to face Legia Warsaw in the Europa Conference League group stage, Villan and Warsaw resident Jo Harper tells BBC Sport the fans' view.
articles.title: The Villa fan living in Warsaw ready for Europe
